# Memorial Museum of 1911 Revolution

|type = History museum
|visitors =
|director =
|curator =

|website =[https://www.xhgmjng.com/ www.xhgmjng.com]

The Memorial Museum of 1911 Revolution (), also known as Xinhai Revolution Memorial Hall, is a Guangzhou-based thematic memorial hall built to commemorate the Xinhai Revolution, with a total investment of RMB 319 million. The museum is located in Changzhou Island, Huangpu District, Guangzhou City.
History
Memorial Museum of 1911 Revolution was officially opened on October 8, 2011, with a main building area of 18,228 square meters.
